description: Apply Gaussian blur to smooth the image or reduce noise.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply Gaussian blur. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Blur radius in pixels from 0.1 to 250. Higher values create more blur. Default is 5.

description: Apply motion blur to simulate movement in a specific direction.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply motion blur. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Direction of blur in degrees from -360 to 360. Default is 0.
Length of blur effect in pixels from 1 to 2000. Default is 10.

description: Apply radial blur creating a spin or zoom effect.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply radial blur. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Blur amount from 1 to 100. Default is 10.
Type of radial blur. Possible values: SPIN, ZOOM. Default is SPIN.
Quality setting. Possible values: DRAFT, GOOD, BEST. Default is GOOD.
Horizontal center position as percentage (0-100). Default is 50.
Vertical center position as percentage (0-100). Default is 50.

description: Apply surface blur that preserves edges while smoothing surfaces.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply surface blur. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Size of the area sampled for blur from 1 to 100. Default is 5.
How different pixels must be before they are affected from 2 to 255. Default is 15.

description: Apply simple box blur averaging pixels in a square area.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply box blur. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Blur radius in pixels from 1 to 999. Default is 5.

description: Sharpen the image to enhance edge definition.

userMessage.error: Unable to sharpen image. Ensure a document is open and try again.

description: Apply stronger sharpening effect to the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply Sharpen More. Ensure a document is open and try again.

description: Apply unsharp mask for precise sharpening control.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply unsharp mask. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Sharpening intensity from 1 to 500 percent. Default is 100.
Size of sharpening halo in pixels from 0.1 to 250. Default is 1.
Minimum brightness change to sharpen from 0 to 255. Default is 0.

description: Apply advanced sharpening with blur type control and shadow/highlight adjustments.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply smart sharpen. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Sharpening intensity from 1 to 500 percent. Default is 100.
Size of sharpening in pixels from 0.1 to 64. Default is 1.
Type of blur to remove. Possible values: GAUSSIAN, LENS, MOTION. Default is GAUSSIAN.
Noise reduction percentage from 0 to 100. Default is 0.

description: Apply high pass filter to retain edge detail and remove low frequency information.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply high pass filter. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Radius in pixels determining which edges to keep from 0.1 to 250. Default is 10.

description: Add random noise or grain to the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to add noise. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of noise to add from 0.1 to 400 percent. Default is 10.
Noise distribution type. Possible values: UNIFORM, GAUSSIAN. Default is GAUSSIAN.
Apply grayscale noise only. Default is false.

description: Reduce digital noise while preserving detail.

userMessage.error: Unable to reduce noise. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Overall noise reduction strength from 0 to 10. Default is 6.
Amount of detail to preserve from 0 to 100 percent. Default is 50.
Color noise reduction from 0 to 100 percent. Default is 50.
Detail sharpening from 0 to 100 percent. Default is 25.

description: Detect edges and blur everything except edges to reduce noise.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply despeckle. Ensure a document is open and try again.

description: Remove dust and scratches from scanned images.

userMessage.error: Unable to remove dust and scratches. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Size of area to search for dissimilar pixels from 1 to 16. Default is 1.
How different pixels must be before elimination from 0 to 255. Default is 0.

description: Apply median filter to reduce noise by replacing pixel values with median of neighboring pixels.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply median filter. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Radius of area to sample from 1 to 100 pixels. Default is 1.

description: Add realistic film grain texture to the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to add film grain. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of grain from 0 to 20. Default is 4.
Size of highlight areas from 0 to 20. Default is 0.
Intensity of highlights from 0 to 10. Default is 10.

description: Create an embossed or raised appearance on the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply emboss effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Direction of light source in degrees from -360 to 360. Default is 135.
Height of emboss from 1 to 10 pixels. Default is 3.
Percentage of effect from 1 to 500. Default is 100.

description: Identify and highlight edges in the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to find edges. Ensure a document is open and try again.

description: Pixelate the image by grouping pixels into larger cells.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply pixelate effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Size of pixel cells from 4 to 200. Default is 10.

description: Create a mosaic effect by grouping pixels into colored blocks.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply mosaic effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Size of mosaic cells from 2 to 200. Default is 10.

description: Apply an oil painting effect to the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply oil paint effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of stylization from 1 to 10. Default is 4.
Smoothness of strokes from 1 to 10. Default is 3.
Scale of brush strokes from 0.1 to 10. Default is 1.
Amount of bristle detail from 0 to 10. Default is 2.

description: Apply a watercolor painting effect to the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply watercolor effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of brush detail from 1 to 14. Default is 8.
Shadow intensity from 0 to 10. Default is 0.
Paper texture amount from 1 to 3. Default is 1.

description: Create a crystallized effect by clumping pixels into polygon shapes.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply crystallize effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Size of crystal cells from 3 to 300. Default is 10.

description: Wrap image around a sphere shape.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply spherize effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of spherical distortion from -100 to 100. Default is 50.
Distortion mode. Possible values: NORMAL, HORIZONTAL, VERTICAL. Default is NORMAL.

description: Rotate and twist the image from the center outward.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply twirl effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of twirl in degrees from -999 to 999. Default is 50.

description: Create wave distortion effect on the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply wave effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Number of wave generators from 1 to 999. Default is 5.
Minimum wavelength from 1 to 998. Default is 10.
Maximum wavelength from 2 to 999. Default is 120.
Minimum amplitude from 1 to 998. Default is 5.
Maximum amplitude from 2 to 999. Default is 35.
Type of wave. Possible values: SINE, TRIANGLE, SQUARE. Default is SINE.

description: Create a rippled water effect on the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply ripple effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of ripple from -999 to 999. Default is 100.
Size of ripples. Possible values: SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE. Default is MEDIUM.

description: Squeeze or bulge the center of the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply pinch effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of pinch from -100 to 100. Positive values pinch inward, negative bulge outward. Default is 50.

description: Create concentric ripple distortion radiating from center.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply ZigZag effect. Ensure a document is open and try again.

params.paramDescription: Amount of zigzag from -100 to 100. Default is 10.
Number of ridges from 1 to 20. Default is 5.
Style of distortion. Possible values: AROUND_CENTER, OUT_FROM_CENTER, POND_RIPPLES. Default is POND_RIPPLES.
